org.digijava.module.translation.exotic

Class AmpDateFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.digijava.module.translation.exotic.AmpDateFormatter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AmpSimpleDateFormatter, ExoticDateFormatter

    public abstract class AmpDateFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for formatting and parsing dates in locales used by AMP. May support locales unsupported by Java8, e.g. Tetum (with the help of ExoticDateFormatter

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter dtf 
      protected java.util.Locale locale 
      protected java.lang.String pattern 
      protected static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> SUPPORTED_FORMATS
      Whitelists supported formats, since formats unused in AMP were not kept in mind when implementing it (reason: too much unrequested work).
